body:
DECLARE @tblThuTienVTBLoi TABLE (DocEntry INT)
INSERT INTO  @tblThuTienVTBLoi (DocEntry)
SELECT
	F.SODocEntry
FROM
    dbo.[@FPTORCT_POSBank_Log] F (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN dbo.[@FPTORCT] O (NOLOCK)
        ON F.SODocEntry = O.U_DocSO
WHERE
    CONVERT(DATE, F.ChargedDateTime) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE())
	AND O.U_MoCCad > 0
	AND F.SODocEntry > 0
	AND O.U_CTLKCode = 'VTB'
	AND O.U_Acbank = 'VTB'
ORDER BY 
	F.SODocEntry

SELECT
    U_DocSO
  , U_MoCash
  , U_MoCCad
  , U_MoVoCh
  , U_MoTran
  , U_Acbank
  , U_CTLKCode
  , IsAutoCard
FROM
    dbo.[@FPTORCT] (NOLOCK)
WHERE
    U_DocSO IN (SELECT DocEntry FROM @tblThuTienVTBLoi)

--DELETE FROM dbo.[@FPTORCT] WHERE U_DocSO IN (SELECT DocEntry FROM @tblThuTienVTBLoi) AND U_Acbank = 'VTB'
